name: Angry Old Jeezers
description:
Fight online with other aspiring jeezers to prove your dominance! Or you can also play with your friends and prove that you are the Greatest Jeezer!

Use the WASD keys for movement

Press Space to make everyone fly forward! But beware, they can do the same to you!

If you want to play it on your browser access it here: https://lykawolfie.itch.io/angry-old-jeezers-sheesh 

It's literally the same game but we "kinda" fixed the resolution for web! Enjoy!
